aasiyawe supiri malala krida tharu sahabhagi wana aasiya gon pri tharagawaliye thewani adiyara ada (12) paswaru 2.00ta sugathadasa gruhastha kridanganaye di aarambha weyi.ithihasaye wadima kridaka kridikawan pirisak ekwana mewara tharagawaliya sandaha ratawal 22ka kridaka kridikawo 245k sahabhagi wethi.chandrika subhashininadika lakmalimitara 400 ya 4 sahaya diwime tharagayata oostreliyanu sahaya diwime kandayama sahabhagi wana athara, mema kandayamata pasugiya olimpik ulele mitar 100 kadulu mathin panadiwime tharagaye ran padakkama dinu sali piyarsan ekwima tharagawaliya kerehi wadi prekshaka aakarshanayak labi thibe.esema olimpik ran padakkam saha aasiyanu ran padakkam dinagath kridaka kridikawan rasakma sahabhagiwana athara, chinaya kridaka kridikawan 42k sahabhagi karamin mewara wadima pirisak sahabhagi kala rata bawata pathweyi.mewara aasiyanu gon pri tharagawaliya sandaha thayilanthaya ha shri lankawa sathkarakathwaya darana athara shri lankawa kridaka kridikawan 24 denaku sahabhagi kaleya.palamu saha dewani adiyara dekama thayilanthaye pawathi athara shrii lankawa ran, ridi ha lokada padakkam kipayakma dina gaththeya.palamu adiyara thayilanthaye bankok hidi pawathi athara ehidi padakkam 4k dinaganna shri lanka kridaka kridikawan samath wuha.mema palamu adiyare di shri lankawata wishala gaurawayak gena demin hella wisikirime isawwen ran padakkama dinagannata nadika lakmali samathwunu athara age dura 56.23k lesa satahan wuna.nadika hella wisikirime jathika shuriya wana athara, 2008 wasare olimpik ulela niyojanaya kalaya.
